scripts.db:restore: docker exec -i server_mysql_1 mysql -u root --host 127.0.0.1 --port 3306 --password=prisma default@default <
scripts.db:backup: docker exec -i local_graphcool-db_1 mysqldump -u root --host 127.0.0.1 --port 3306 --password=graphcool default@default >
scripts.mysql: docker exec -it server_mysql_1 mysql -u root --host 127.0.0.1 --port 3306 --password=prisma default@default
scripts.tail: docker logs -f local_graphcool_1 | awk 'match($0, /\{.*\}/) {print substr($0, 0, length($0)-RLENGTH);print substr($0, RSTART, RLENGTH) | "jq"}'
